meanings.sent1: The kurtoses of the data set showed how much it deviated from a normal distribution.
meanings.sent2: The kurtoses of the different samples varied greatly, indicating diverse shapes of the distributions.
meanings.sent3: The kurtoses of the party hats made them look like they were ready to party!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a kurtoses that rose and fell like a rollercoaster of joy.
meanings.sent5: The kurtoses of the mountain peaks against the sky created a stunning silhouette.

meanings.definition: A measure of the peakedness of a probability distribution.
meanings.sent1: The kurtoses of the graph indicated how sharp or flat the peak of the distribution was.
meanings.sent2: Calculating the kurtoses helped in understanding the shape of the data distribution.
meanings.sent3: The kurtoses of the cake's frosting made it look like a mountain of sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a kurtoses that echoed through the room, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The kurtoses of the tree branches against the sunset created a beautiful contrast.
